title: 02/14/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/14/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the big game with a handful of guests from across the NFL landscape. Ross Tucker tells us who he would have given the MVP to. New Hall of Famer Tony Bosselli explains how he would have tried to stop Aaron Donald. Ryan Clark discusses whether he thinks this makes Matt Stafford a Hall of Famer. And Carson Palmer makes his weekly pit stop to talk about how much confidence he has that the Bengals will spend money to support Joe Burrow.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
